casebody.data:
Bjorn G. WAHLGREN, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. STANDARD OIL COMPANY OF NEW JERSEY, Defendant-Appellee. No. 40, Docket 20691. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 15, 1947. Jacob Rassner, of New York City, for plaintiff-appellant. Vernon S. Jones, of New York City, for defendant-appellee.

Before A. N. HAND, CLARK, and FRANK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed in open court.
